title: The Big Suey: Paul Sorrento
description:
FOX Sports' Jay Glazer joins the show to discuss the Tua phenomenon, the issues with the Carolina Panthers, the improvement of Detroit, and learning to deal with his "F***edupness". Mike Schur then joins to continue to randomly name 90s baseball players. And we spotlight a recent addition to the LAF network, The Cooligans, who recently travelled to Germany to speak to USMNT Giovanni Reyna.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
